captions.text:
- I WANT TO FIND OUT--
DO I DO SQUATS?

WHAT DO I DO
TO LOOK MORE LIKE YOU?

- I LITERALLY
AM TRYING TO, LIKE--

I'M WORKING OUT.
I'M DOING EVERYTHING I CAN.

IF I TOLD YOU,
I'D HAVE TO KILL YOU.

I'M DOING EVERYTHING
I POSSIBLY CAN.

I'LL SHOW YOU DURING THE BREAK
WHAT I'M DOING.

- AND THEN YOU'LL TELL ME
WHAT YOU DID FOR YOUR BIRTHDAY.

FIRST OF ALL,
I DON'T KNOW IF YOU SAW NICKI

SHE DID IMPRESSIONS
OF KIM KARDASHIAN AND BEYONCE,

AND I THOUGHT YOU DID
A REALLY GOOD JOB ON BOTH,

- DID YOU HEAR
FROM EITHER OF THEM?

NO, YOU'RE REALLY GOOD.
- ME DOING THAT POUT.

'CAUSE YOU KNOW
HOW SHE'S ALWAYS LIKE--

- I THOUGHT
YOU DID A GOOD JOB,

AND I DIDN'T THINK
IT WAS A SLAM TO EITHER OF THEM.

I THOUGHT YOU WERE HONORING
BOTH OF THEM.

- NO, NO, BECAUSE I LOVE
BOTH OF THEM.

I LOVE BOTH OF THEM.
- YEAH.

NOW, WHEN YOU HAVE--
THE ALBUM--

FIRST OF ALL,
THE SONGS I'VE HEARD,

'CAUSE I HAVEN'T HEARD
ALL OF THEM

THAT YOU HAVE NOT LET ME
HEAR YET.

A LOT OF STUFF
ABOUT RELATIONSHIP.

THERE'S OTHER THINGS,
"PILLS N POTIONS," RIGHT?

SO IS SOMETHING GOING ON
THAT YOU'D LIKE

- HOW ARE YOU DOING?
YOU OKAY?

- YOU KNOW WHAT?
I'M REALLY HAPPY.

AND I THINK THAT'S WHAT
IT'S ALL ABOUT, RIGHT?

- IT IS.
IT'S ALL ABOUT BEING HAPPY.

I JUST--I JUST FEEL LIKE
SOMETIMES YOU DON'T KNOW

WHY SOMETHING CRAZY
OR DIFFICULT OR EMOTIONAL

UNTIL YOU ARE ABLE TO USE IT
TO, LIKE, HELP OTHER PEOPLE

OR USE IT TO BE THERAPEUTIC
TO YOURSELF AND TO GROW FROM IT,

AND NOW I REALIZE WHY I HAD
SO MUCH OF AN EMOTIONAL YEAR.

I MEAN,
I WAS WRITING MY ALBUM,

AND I THINK I NEEDED TO GROW
AS A HUMAN BEING,

AND NOW BECAUSE OF IT,
I JUST FEEL, LIKE, BETTER.

I FEEL LIKE
I'VE GOTTEN RID OF THINGS

THAT WERE NOT HEALTHY FOR ME,
YOU KNOW WHAT I MEAN?

AND THAT'S ALL YOU CAN
REALLY HOPE FOR, RIGHT?

I AM SO GLAD
THAT YOU'RE FEELING PEACEFUL.

YOU KNOW HOW MUCH
I LOVE YOU.

I HAVE A GIFT FOR YOU.
- OH, MY GOD.

NO, I HATE YOU SO MUCH.
I COULD'VE BROKEN MY NECK.

DID YOU WANT TO SEE
MORE VIDEOS?

- THIS IS MY FIRST TIME
ON A TALK SHOW.

- WHAT IS IT, NOAH?
- MY FIRST TIME ON A TALK SHOW.
